Text:
Hi Zlatko,
do you know what happened to the comments?
All blown away - but why?
Hope to here from you soon again.
Tom B.

Hi Tom 
it's nothing serious
probably some kind of  "database error"
but they fix problem

Thanks for information!
I answered to Phil by mail, because I didn't find the song he needed for funeral, too.
Please check your spam filter at email address you forwarded to Phil. You should find my Email to Phil in copy. 
If you found it, please reply a brief email, too. So we can communicate for all future. Tom B.
it took me a while, but I finally realize of your new account. thanks as always
